name: Taurus War
description:
【2024 NEW SCI-FI GAME】
Taurus War is a Sci-Fi turn-based strategy game.Simple and quick to learn, even if you have no experience in turn-based games.
【VARIOUS TACTICS】
Different units have different exclusive skills, such as summoning, invincibility, blocking,healing, etc., and various units will form a variety of tactical play methods.

【UNREAL ENGINE】
This game uses UE5 technology to create SCI-FI battlefield

【ENDLESS PLAY TIME】
Explore Taurus ,train units, and more.Simple one touch game play with lots of levels that will keep you entertained for hours.
